summary: Documentary about rock pioneer Roky Erickson, detailing his rise as a psychedelic hero, his lengthy institutionalization, his descent into poverty and filth, and his brother's struggle with their religious mother to improve Roky's care.
cast: Byron Coley|13th Floor Elevators|Evelyn Erickson|Roky Erickson|Sumner Erickson|Billy Gibbons|Clementine Hall|Gibby Haynes|Chet Helms|Kurt Loder|Thurston Moore|Patti Smith|John Ike Walton
title: You're Gonna Miss Me
